nodes.text: The djorra was a species of purple vine that was native to Garqi, an agriworld in the Cassandran Worlds. In 6 ABY, a series of djorra vines grew across the face of a vehicle shed used by former-CorSec investigator Corran Horn to hide his X-wing starfighter.

Michael A. Stackpole created the djorra vine for his short story "Missed Chance," first published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 7 in 1995. This story was subsequently republished in the Tales from the Empire anthology in 1997, and online with Hyperspace in 2004.
